caption.p: Concentrations of total PAs in the stream at the surface water monitoring site ( A) and in seepage waters in the wells ( B) ± SDs of the total PA concentrations in triplicate samples. The type 1 PAs represent the sum of nine PAs that were detected in plants and water (Fig. 4), whereas the type 2 PAs represent the sum of twelve PAs that were detected in water only (Table 1 of the SM). The dates of the sampling events are listed in Table 2 of the SM, the seepage water sampling locations mapped in Fig. 2.
